description:

Now, Cody has coaxed her into a rendezvous and knows Markie won't be around. Join Cody as he meets up with Lola for a clandestine booty call. Watch Lola suck and worship his throbbing erection as Cody soaks in ecstatic sensation. Experience his incredibly thick, hard cock ravage Lola, and all in secret. Find out if Markie discovers them. And learn where this extended affair may be leading.
title: Path Of Seduction Part Two
